description.value: Action Cost: 1 [Interact] action Range: Self Effect: Choose any one skill. For 10 minutes, you count as having rank 5 proficiency in that skill (use rank 5 for all checks, even if your actual rank is higher or lower). The wisdom of ages flows through you, granting you temporary mastery. If you already have rank 5+, you instead subtract 1 from both dice when using that skill for the duration. Usage: Uses 1 Channel Divinity
